name: Duplicafé
description:
Z- Pickup/Use     ArrowKeys- Move    X-End Day Early     R-Restart

Time works strangely in this cafe, over the course of 5 days your previous selves repeat their actions of past days. Work with your past and plan for your future to accomplish your goals.

Grab apples from the apple box and place them in the prep area on the left side of a stove. Then use to middle section to boil some cider. Finally pick up the cider from the right side pickup and deliver it to the bar.

Made for the Ludum Dare Compo in 48 Hours

LD Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/duplicafe
